name: Total War: ATTILA - Slavic Nations Pack
name_original: Total War: ATTILA - Slavic Nations Pack
description:
Total War: ATTILA - Slavic Nations Pack is a strategy game developed by Creative Assembly. It came out on 25-02-2016. SEGA published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Total War: ATTILA - Slavic Nations Pack is available on PC.
